text: KCKB (104.1 MHz) is a radio station licensed to Moran, Texas. The station airs a Christian format, along with secular conservative talk programs.Programs", The Positive Radio Network. Retrieved July 9, 2019. It is owned by Positive Radio Network, LLC.FM Query Results: KCKB, fcc.gov. Retrieved July 9, 2019. It is an affiliate of the Rangers Radio Network.Radio Affiliates: Rangers Radio Network, Major League Baseball. Retrieved July 9, 2019. ==History== The construction permit for KCKB was granted February 28, 2017 and was held by Brazos TV, Inc.Application Search Details – BNPH-20151013AIO, fcc.gov. Retrieved July 9, 2019. The permit was sold later that year to Two Way Communications for $10,000."Deal Digest", Inside Radio. June 15, 2017. Retrieved July 9, 2019. In 2018, the permit for KCKB was sold to Positive Radio Network, LLC, along with KBLY, for $87,000."Deal Digest", Inside Radio. November 8, 2018. Retrieved July 9, 2019."Sold: Texas FM Pair, Florida AM, Tennessee College Station", All Access Music Group. November 2, 2018. Retrieved July 9, 2019.Jacobson, Adam. "Ferris Wheels In A Sunshine State AM", Radio & Television Business Report. November 2, 2018. Retrieved July 9, 2019. The station began broadcasting on February 1, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * CKB CKB Category:Radio stations established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Texas
title: KCKB (FM)
